Shahid Kapoor's Rugged Avatar In Kabir Singh Will Remind You Of Udta Punjab & Fans Are Impressed!
Shahid Kapoor's Rugged Avatar In Kabir Singh Will Remind You Of Udta Punjab & Fans Are Impressed!
It has been long since we saw Shahid Kapoor in a film, right? He was last seen in Batti Gul Meter Chalu.
pinimg.com
The man who has often left us floored with his impeccable performances in movies like Kaminey and Haider is back with a bang.
Screengrab
Shahid Kapoor will next be seen in Kabir Singh, which is a remake of the original Telugu hit 'Arjun Reddy'.
Screengrab
He plays a Doctor, Lover and a Rebel -- all that the same time. His character seems intense, powerful and disturbed too. In just one-minute teaser, he has left us all floored. Without further ado, take a look!
From drugs to alcohol and a raw-edgy avatar of Shahid Kapoor, didn’t the teaser remind you of Udta Punjab?
Screengrab

The movie is directed by Sandeep Vanga, the man who was behind the original one as well.
Kiara Advani, who is known for her role in Lust Stories, is playing Shahid's love interest in the movie.
Screengrab
In an interview earlier, Shahid Kapoor had revealed what drove him to sign this project.
“I usually don’t watch too many films in Telugu and it surprised me with its tonality, rawness, simplicity and the fact that it was so real and believable. The character is very fascinating for me as an actor because the emotional arc... is very original. I loved it and Vijay Deverakonda, who played Arjun, did it so well,” he said.
We are eagerly waiting for this one. What about you?
